head.title: Customer Testimonials | RMR Construction & Remodeling
head.description: Discover why homeowners and businesses trust RMR Construction & Remodeling. Read testimonials highlighting our exceptional craftsmanship, reliability, and dedication to customer satisfaction.
head.keywords: RMR Construction & Remodeling testimonials, customer reviews, reliable roofing services, trusted roofing contractors, quality craftsmanship, roof repairs, roof replacements, customer satisfaction, Northern California roofing experts

message.p: When choosing a roofing contractor I spoke with four businesses before picking Jeff at RMR Construction & Remodeling. Jeff impressed me as a person that cared about doing a quality job, and offered suggestions how to make my roof better, not just replace shingles. We are very happy we went with RMR Construction & Remodeling because our house now looks so much better and our neighbors told us how good our roof looks now. We couldn’t be more pleased now the job is complete.
RMR Construction & Remodeling did a great job on replacing my roof. Their pricing is competitive, and their craftsmanship is exceptional. I highly recommend Jeff and his crew.

RMR Construction & Remodeling is a premier roofing company. They were extremely skilled and were always professional and very respectful. I’ll never need another roof, but if I did Jeff Volgt owner of RMR Construction & Remodeling is the man. Highly recommend this great company.

Jeff came out after we experiences wind-driven rain damage to an area of our roof. He provided a quick inspection and a fair price for the repair. He and his team arrived promptly to begin repairs, were thorough, and extremely professional. I highly recommend this company for your roofing needs; we will definitely use them again in the future.
Very pleased with RMR Construction & Remodeling. The estimate, bid, and work done to install our new roof was excellent. We are pleased with the result and highly recommend them!

RMR Construction & Remodeling was recommended by a neighbor who had his roof replaced by RMR Construction & Remodeling 8 year's ago and was very pleased with the service and results. I valued his opinion and gave them a call. I had not experienced any roof leaks as of yet, but watching my other neighbors and the problems with  their roof leaks and patchy roof repairs left me wondering what's the best strategy for a almost 30 year roof. I opted for a complete roof replacement. I was given a cost estimate and the possibility of damaged wood replacement, but that couldn't be determined until the roof was completely removed. Luckily I had very little damage, mostly just some trim, due to sun exposure. Top quality material was used and I even had my gutters with leaf guards installed. They did it all in a week. The workers were respectful and tidy. These guys worked really hard and my wife and I are very happy ðŸ˜Š.

From Jeff's first visit to inspect the old roof to the final inspection, the entire process was exceptional. Jeff's bid was acceptable and, since I had gotten rave reviews from prior customers, I didn't even look for a second bid.  Jeff's crew was outstanding. They were knowledgeable and professional. I was kept informed throughout the entire job and never questioned their competency.  Jeff provided for some variables and brought the entire project in, on time, and on budget.  I cannot recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling highy enough. From beginning to end it was great experience.

Jeff and his crew did a great job with replacing our roof, and for a reasonable price. His crew was always on time, hard working and courteous. Jeff was friendly, easy to communicate with and very willing to work with me to meet the unique challenges our house required. I highly recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling to anyone needing a new roof.

We found RMR Construction & Remodeling to be an exceptionally professional roofing company. Jeff was responsive to our emergency need for a re-roof, and worked with us to make that happen in a very timely manner. We’re very satisfied with the quality and value.

Jeff and his team were excellent! They went above and beyond to make sure we were happy with our new roof. They arrived early each day and the project was done within the time and price quoted. They cleaned up the work area daily and made sure to pick up any debris/nails that had come down during the workday. We have had multiple compliments on our new roof. Jeff took the time to explain what our options were and what he recommended. He was easy to communicate with, friendly, fair and knowledgeable! I would highly recommend them to anyone needing a new roof!

RMR Construction & Remodeling did a great job on our new roof!  The owner, Jeff Vogt very professional and responsive.  He answered any questions thoroughly and made sure we knew what we could expect to happen each day. The crew arrived early every morning and did a good job of cleaning up everyday. We've had many compliments on the roof and what a great job was done.  I would highly recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling!

Jeff and his crew did a great job on our roof replacement. We are very satisfied with how Jeff kept us updated throughout the entire process and the final result. Finding experienced and reliable contractors can be a challenge. However, we found our roofer. If any of our friends or family need roof work done, we will tell them to call RMR Construction & Remodeling.

RMR Construction & Remodeling completely removed our existing 2-piece clay tile roof and installed a new 1-piece S tile clay roof. This was a large, difficult job. They were prompt, efficient, fair, reasonable, and professional. They do what they say and the clean up daily. It was a pleasure working with Jeff and his crew. I would highly recommend them.

Jeff and his crew were professional, showed up every morning, worked hard in the Folsom summer, and created a beautiful roof while not cutting corners. We had some unexpected dry rot and Jeff offered solutions keeping in mind any future resale considerations at a fair price. It’s hard to find a reliable and honest contractor it seems these days, but I would trust Jeff with any future work and cannot recommend him highly enough. As a bonus, he was very responsive with questions and took the time to explain the process or any decisions that needed to be made. If you need a roof done right, reach out to Jeff and RMR Construction & Remodelingâ€”you won’t be disappointed.

We were recommended to Roseville Roseville through Aztec Solar, our roof was 30 years old and was not ready for panels just yet. I got into contact with Jeff and he came over right away and gave me a great quote for our home and detached garage. As we were figuring out financials, Jeff was super patient with us and didn’t bug us until we were ready! We got the funds, I called them and they started the following week! The team was on time, very nice and got so much done even in these triple digit days!! Our project was done in under a week and we absolutely love the way it looks. I will definitely tell all my friends and family to use RMR Construction & Remodeling

Everything about RMR Construction & Remodeling merits 5 stars. I hired them to replace my roof and gutters. The entire team was very professional and provided high quality services -from the initial estimate meeting with Jeff Vogt, to showing up on time, to replacing dry areas, installing new roofing & gutters, to final cleanup. My roof is beautiful! I highly recommend this company!

Jeff along with Sammy & his team removed the existing roof and gave our patio cover and chimney flashing extra attention to correct issues that existed from the original home construction.  New shingles, facia boards, vents and updated attic venting were installed.  The team was very professional, cleaned up everyday, didn’t harm any of the landscaping or plants and got it all done between storms.  No leaks, no concerns with current rain or wind gusts.  Life is good!

We could not be any happier with the new roof that Jeff and his crew installed on Oct 2018. Jeff was upfront with his pricing and "on-target" with repairs that might have been needed. No surprises or unnecessary up-selling. Questions and concerns were addressed honestly throughout the install process. We highly recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling without any reservation.

I've been a customer of RMR Construction & Remodeling for about a decade. The first large project was replacing an original shake roof with a lightweight tile roof. Even though it was light weight tile there was still some reinforcements and retrofitting required. The team at RMR Construction & Remodeling was courteous, transparent, and professional throughout that whole process. Additionally, they helped with some minor issues with upkeep over the years. We are in a new home now but RMR Construction & Remodeling has even lent a hand in some evaluations and assessments on a roof that they didn't even install. RMR Construction & Remodeling truly cares about their clients and goes the extra mile. I highly recommend them.

If you need a new roof - Jeff and his team should be your first choice.  We have had both our house and barn roofs replaced by them and their quality and professionalism is unsurpassed.  The understructure of our house roof  needed substantial repair because flashngs, metal roof edging, sheathing and facia boards were not properly installed 23 years ago.  Jeff was able to spot these problems and address the costs in his initial bid so there  were no big cost surprises.  We appreciated his honesty and integrity.

Having been in construction all my life it is good to know who the reliable contractors are. We had issues with our existing roof (20 year old home) and drainage off that roof. Because it is tile we had no interest in re-roofing we just needed to correct these issues of flooding over our entry way and water in our garage. Jeff came out and recommended modifications  that included new gutters and additional downspouts along with adjustments to the tile along the perimeter. I write this review during a rainstorm, pleasantly surprised and grateful we no longer  have these issues.

His crew along with his subcontractor for the gutters were on schedule, cleaned up daily and were excellent to work with. During my professional career I could not make recommendations regarding  construction, but now that  I’m  retired I do not hesitate to recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling for all your roofing and gutter needs.

RMR Construction & Remodeling did an amazing, thorough job with our gutters and tile roof.  They were fast and efficient.  Jeff Vogt followed up with detailed inspection.  We would highly recommend this company.

Jeff with RMR Construction & Remodeling was a pleasure to work with.  All work contracted was done in a timely and professional manner.  I highly recommend using RMR Construction & Remodeling.  Pricing was fair and work was top notch.

This company is the best. Not one issue. Great price, perfect service. Jeff is always available to answer questions and concerns. Truly the best home improvement project I’ve ever done! Will refer them to all my friends and family.

With all the recent heavy weather I became concerned when taking down my Christmas lights I noticed a visible sag in a short, specific area of my roof. I had no leaks and the sag was not visible from inside the attic. Jeff Vogt came by and did a thorough inspection of the area. After explaining to me (very clearly) how the roof is designed, he assured me there was no real cause for concern. Though it may not have been the best design or construction practices (28 year old roof), there was no reason to be worried, other than the minor aesthetics. He could have pursued a big payday but instead, satisfied my concerns and saved me $$$. I highly recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling for their expertise and professional manner.

Wow! What an amazing company. I had a Leak appear in a bedroom ceiling on Christmas. Totally panicked and worried. I called Sunday and left a message for RMR Construction & Remodeling and was amazed that the owner, Jeff, called me back Monday morning and had his crew out before end of day. Not only did they fix the issue on the spot, Jeff went out of his way to explain everything and reassure me. I cannot applaud this company enough. They deserve 10 stars in an era where it is so rare to find companies with such integrity and customer oriented. Thank you Jeff and your crew!! I'll keep you on my speed dial for any future roofing issues!

We had a roof leak during a heavy storm and discovered we had a water intrusion into the house when we got up in the morning. I called RMR Construction & Remodeling and Jeff ( the owner) came out the same day. He took photos, did a temporary patch & seal initially and returned the following day with material to seal the roof enough to get us through the next series of storms. Once the weather cleared he replaced all the damage ( caused by squirrels) to the roof, installed an underlayment that was superior to the original one and made all the repairs necessary to get us a water proof roof structure again. They also installed wire mesh to prevent the squirrels from getting back to their spot under our Spanish tile roof. They were quick, clean and very respectful of our property. The repair work turned out great and we are ready for the next round of storms. RMR Construction & Remodeling is now my permanent go to roofing company.

Jeff and his crew were professional, showed up every morning, worked hard in the Folsom summer, and created a beautiful roof while not cutting corners. We had some unexpected dry rot and Jeff offered solutions keeping in mind any future resale considerations at a fair price. It's hard to find a reliable and honest contractor it seems these days, but I would trust Jeff with any future work and cannot recommend him highly enough. As a bonus, he was very responsive with questions and took the time to explain the process or any decisions that needed to be made. If you need a roof done right, reach out to Jeff and RMR Construction & Remodeling--you won't be disappointed.
Just when I thought ethics & standards were lost in business- Jeff and his team reinstated my hope.

I was in need of a roofer, and upon coincidence my neighbor had one reinstalling a slipped tile. Long story short, I called Jeff and he had his employee come back, after leaving my neighbors house to take care of my issue. He was very accommodating despite the last minute request.
Pedro showed up 45 minutes and spent less then 15 minutes to diagnose the issue. He was prompt, efficient, and most importantly honest about the price.
I really couldn't ask for a better resolution to my issue. Jeff was honest and straight forward. Thank you.
Jeff did a great job of replacing my roof in Granite Bay.

His estimate was reasonable and his team finished the job on time (which was even more impressive considering the fairly large nature of the project). Most importantly, RMR Construction & Remodeling did high quality work and I have gotten compliments on it from multiple people. I really appreciated how considerate everyone was and how they tried to clean up any mess they made.

Jeff and his team were excellent! They went above and beyond to make sure we were happy with our new roof. They arrived early each day and the project was done within the time and price quoted. They cleaned up the work area daily and made sure to pick up any debris/nails that had come down during the workday. We have had multiple compliments on our new roof. Jeff took the time to explain what our options were and what he recommended. He was easy to communicate with, friendly, fair and knowledgeable! I would highly recommend them to anyone needing a new roof!

Jeff, and his team are an example of honesty and integrity! They got the job done at a fair price and are some of the nicest guys I have ever met! They worked hard, and even did several things that were not in the bid, at a very minimal price. The sheeting under my old roof had a lot of dry rot and was installed poorly, Jeff redesigned the roof, so I won't have these issues anymore. I am very grateful for his expertise and a job that looks fantastic!

I've used Jeff Vogt and RMR Construction & Remodeling for over 10 years. Jeff is always on point, extremly responsive for little jobs and large projects. I would recommend RMR Construction & Remodeling for any job knowing they will back up their work 100%.

Jeff, at RMR Construction & Remodeling, returned my desperate call in early February during the worst part of the rain storms, when every other company either ignored the voice mails or said they'd call back and did not! Jeff said he'd be there at 2pm, but when he got held up, he found another person to do the work. The guy showed up in the middle of a rain storm to fix a significant leak in my roof. It was fixed quickly and effectively. He took pictures and showed me the before and after repairs. I couldn't be happier with the work they did and highly recommend them!
